snippet: Apple’s stock dropped after the company reported that its iPhone sales fell 5 percent from a year earlier....
abstract: Stocks close with gains following losses earlier in day, as markets react to mixed earnings reports.
lead_paragraph: Apple’s stock dropped after the company reported that its iPhone sales fell 5 percent from a year earlier.

headline.main: Wall St. Ends Mixed Amid Quarterly Earnings Reports
headline.print_headline: Apple iPhone Sales Are a Drag on Tech as Markets React to Earnings Reports
